component.name: Bforartists
component.summary: Bforartists is a complete, free and opensource 3D suite to create CG content.

description.p:
This is an unofficial Flatpak build of Bforartists.
Bforartists is a fork of the popular open source 3D software Blender. Developed by some 3D enthusiasts to make Blender's UI even better.

ul.li:
Bforartists 3 Version 3.6.0 is maintenance and bug fix release. It also comes with a special "add as instance" toggle for the Asset Browser. This build is about Blender 3.6.0 feature set with the usual updating and changes to keep this consistent and compatible with the latest.
This version comes with 50 tasks and bug fixes from us with the additional updates and features from Blender 3.6.0 and 4.0.0 development.
